name: When the Wind Knocks 风敲门事件
name_original: When the Wind Knocks 风敲门事件
description:
语言包含中英文。

中文版有部分UI是英文。

Languages: Chinese/English

 

       你是在H城生活的一个普通人。有一天你十年未见过面的高中同学突然约你在咖啡厅谈谈。她是个懦弱的人，外貌凄惨如同死者，当初在学校里备受欺凌。出于好奇你去和她见面了，她提起了当年毁掉学校名誉的一起自杀案。谨慎选择你要说的话，也许她会告诉你那起案件的真相。

       You are an ordinary girl living in City H. One day, an old high school classmate suddenly invites you to a café for a talk. It has been ten years since the last time you met. She was a weak person, as ugly as death, and was bullied a lot by that time. You go to meet her out of curiosity, and she mentions a suicide case which ruined the reputation of that high school. Carefully choose what you are going to say and maybe she will tell you the truth of that case.

游戏包括两个不同的结局和一个隐藏对话。游戏中的每个选项都会影响最终结局和能否解锁隐藏内容。

The game includes two different endings and a hidden dialogue. Every choice you make will affect the ending and whether you can unlock the hidden dialogue.

 

注意事项：本作为恐怖游戏，部分剧情和描写可能引起不适。

                          16岁以上玩家可以游玩。

Warning: This is a horror game and some of the plot and description could cause discomfort.

                      16+ for certain parts of depiction of killing

 

       文本量：2万字左右。

       Text Volume: about 20 thousand Chinese characters (meaning pretty short)

 

       本游戏免费，如果喜欢请留下评论，这是对我最大的支持。

       This is a free game. If you like it, please leave a comment. That will be great support for me.

 

       我对游戏开发了解得很少，如果在游玩中出现任何问题可以在评论区留言，我尽量解决。

       I am new in game development. If any problem occurs, please leave a comment and I will try my best to solve it.
